level.text: No person shall park any vehicle or permit any vehicle to remain parked during the times and days indicated on a Street Cleaning Route.

Parking prohibitions for street cleaning shall override any less restrictive parking privileges at designated locations during the times and days specified, except for parking restrictions imposed by the District during snow emergencies on designated snow emergency routes.
When the opposite blockface is restricted for street cleaning purposes, parking shall be allowed on designated streets that are otherwise restricted during the times and days specified.
